name: Princess Rescue (Episode 1)
description:
Another great retro action game from the 80's.
This time you are a Reginald and you have to rescue your loved Princess imprisoned in the last part of the castle.
Nice graphics and very easy to play.
Kids will love it!

How to play:
- Use left/right to move the prince
- Use jump or jump + left/right
- Use crouch to avoid beams and arrows

Every time you complete a level you will receive:
- Lives x 200 Points.

For example, if you have 4 lives you will receive 800 points.

For info and suggestions visit our website.
Enjoy!
